experiences.title: Software Development Intern
experiences.description: Working on Android and web applications using React Native, PHP, and MySQL for government projects including NMC Sky Sign Department, Akola SEVA Project, and Tribal PWD.
responsibilities: Enhanced Android and web applications using React Native, PHP, and MySQL
Enabled display of 650+ registered hoardings for NMC Sky Sign Department
Trained officers across 27+ police stations for SEVA app adoption
Improved web application for Tribal PWD managing 130+ schools

experiences.title: Co-Lead
experiences.description: Led coding club activities, conducted workshops, mentored students, and organized hackathons.
responsibilities: Conducted interactive seminars and workshops on web development for 50+ students
Managed club activities and mentored peers
Organized a college-level hackathon with 30+ teams and 150+ students
